name: Human Pandemy
description:
Hey... :/

A pandemic is ravaging humans. To survive, a scientist puts his mind into the body of a robot. He wakes up in his laboratory, and will have to escape, and join the spaceship that overlooks the city ...

There are actually 2 gamemodes, First-person, or Third-person.

A trailer is coming soon ! :)

-- If you found any bug, please leave a comment !--

I've worked so hard on this game. Enjoy the graphics !

Minimum requirements :

  • Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo 
  • Graphics : Geforce GTX 9400M
  • Memory : 4Go

Recommended requirements :

  • Processor : 2,5 GHz Intel Core I5
  • Memory : 8Go DDR3
  • Graphics : AMD Radeon HD 6750M 512Mo
